mapper.insert: insert into member( id_str, passwd_str, name_str, email_str, post_str, addr_str, addr2_str, tel_str, cel_str, reg_date, remote_addr_str ) values(#{id_str} ,#{passwd_str} ,#{name_str} ,#{email_str} ,#{post_str}, #{addr_str} ,#{addr2_str} ,#{tel_str} ,#{cel_str} ,now() ,#{remote_addr_str} )
mapper.update: update member_level set level_name= #{level_name} where member_level_no =#{member_level_no}
mapper.select: select member_no,member_id,member_name,member_post,member_addr,member_number,member_level_no,member_regist_date from member where member_id = #{member_id} and member_pw = #{member_pw} and member_status_no != 3

select m.member_no,m.member_id,m.member_pw,m.member_name,m.member_post,m.member_addr,m.member_number,m.member_level_no,ml.member_level_name,ms.member_status_name,m.member_regist_date from (member m left join member_level ml on m.member_level_no = ml.member_level_no) join member_status ms on m.member_status_no = ms.member_status_no where m.member_no = #{member_no} order by m.member_no desc
